name: Curiosity Killed the Astronaut
description:
Curiosity Killed the Astronaut is a whimsical, text adventure game built with Twine. The narrative for the game is loosely based on the Japanese folklore tale, Momotarō (桃太郎, "Peach Boy“).  

The player takes the role of an astronaut in a team of three, sent aboard a space station to undertake hull repairs. The player is tasked with making choices throughout the game, where they can choose to either be curious and face the dangers and consequences ahead, or play it safe in the abyss of outer space.
